#summary thistle is a color keyword defined in CSS and usable wherever a color value is required.

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSColors Colors] > *thistle*

== Value ==

The `thistle` color keyword is equivalent to `#d8bfd8`.
